ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Provision and invite a SCIM user
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Provision and invite a SCIM user
ActivityMetadata.Description: Provision organization membership for a user, and send an activation email to the email address.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Provision and invite a SCIM user

Provision organization membership for a user, and send an activation email to the email address.

Method: Post

OperationID: scim/provision-and-invite-user

EndPoint:

/scim/v2/organizations/{org}/Users

Usage: emails[]

[{ "value": "%value%", "primary": "%primary%", "type": "%type%" }]
